question: Indian Navy concluded the two-day naval passage exercise PASSEX in the South China Sea, with which country?
explanation:
The Navies of India and Vietnam has concluded the two-day naval passage exercise PASSEX in the South China Sea.
This exercise has been organised as part of efforts to boost maritime cooperation between the two countries. Indian Navy Ship (INS) Kiltan reached Vietnam under Mission Sagar-III with Humanitarian Assistance and Disaster Relief (HADR) stores for flood-affected people of Central Vietnam.
